title: Ask me anything about climbing in ranked solo queue
body:
Given that I've climbed from gold 4 to plat 2 in the last week, it's been pretty fun as the last few seasons I haven't had to climb to get to my desired elo. I simply place in plat 3-1 and get Diamond and AFK for the season. This climb has reminded me of the journey, the grind, the climb - though it hasn't been that challenging, it has reminded me of what you need to do as a player to climb and I think that's what gives me a good track record here given I've done this climb twice (s3 went from silver 1 to plat 1 and now G4 to plat 2 and will hit Diamond in a few days)

Ask away
